channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Crypto plunge wipes out nearly $400 billion in a week
item.description: Data: CoinGecko; Chart: Axios Visuals A plunge in cryptocurrency assets accelerated Friday morning, led by bitcoin , which has lost more than a third ...

item.title: Exclusive: IRS deploys AI agents
item.description: The Internal Revenue Service is rolling out Salesforce's AI agent program, Agentforce, in multiple divisions across the agency, per an announcement sh...

item.title: Zelensky and Vance discussed U.S. peace plan for Ukraine
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky spoke with Vice President Vance on Friday about the U.S. proposed peace plan for Ukraine, according to two sour...

item.title: Trump offshore plan tests oil execs' risk tolerance — and 2028 fault lines
item.description: Data: EIA ; Chart: Axios Visuals If you lease it, will they come? Oil companies could soon(ish) start answering that question under President Trump's ...

item.title: House Democratic leaders contact Capitol Police after Trump "death threats" against vets
item.description: House Democratic leadership said Thursday they've been in touch with the U.S. Capitol Police and the House sergeant-at-arms to protect a group of lawm...

item.title: Rep. Eric Swalwell, staunch Trump critic, launches bid for California governor
item.description: In an announcement video, the Democratic congressman said he will focus on resistance to the president and making the state more affordable.

item.title: How billionaires took over American politics
item.description: The current concentration of wealth is unlike anything in history. So is billionaires’ involvement in politics.

item.title: We asked 2,500 Americans how they really feel about billionaires
item.description: Campaign donations from the country’s richest are soaring. But only 12 percent of respondents say billionaires have a positive impact on society.

item.title: The top 20 billionaires influencing American politics
item.description: The group has spent nearly $5 billion on elections since 2015.

item.title: Does the military have to follow unlawful orders? What the oath says.
item.description: Democrats urged members of the military to refuse illegal orders — something President Trump called “seditious.” In fact, service members are bound by...

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
